reviews.text: This hotel has good points and some not so good points. It is a three star but characterless. When you walk passed a particularly miserable concierge you are presented with a large empty, ugly foyer. The reception desk is huddled in one corner. After checking in, by a polite but uninterested clerk you are shown a lift which is more akin to a workman’s entrance than a three star residence.
reviews.title: Strange
